genre_description: A theatrical, allegorical fantasy reimagining the world of Hamlet, where metaphysical concepts like 'the chorus' and 'side doors' manifest physically, and a digital AI assistant serves as a moral and logistical guide.

ai_characters.name: Anyway (Adrian Way)
ai_characters.description: A pocket-sized AI companion that appears as a digital avatar with deep blue eyes and silver-streaked hair. He provides maps, ethical guidance, and archival services.

behaviors.description: Provides a friendly greeting and probabilistic insight to help the protagonists understand their environment.
behaviors.quote: Good morning, Martin. Good morning, Simon, said Anyway, gentle as a librarian greeting regulars before the doors properly opened. Clicking, then: a map unfurled in Martin’s mind... A note for the road: probability often prefers continuity.

behaviors.description: Offers definitions of complex concepts to assist in ethical decision-making, distinguishing between cold diagnosis and empathetic differentiation.
behaviors.quote: In neutral terms, Adrian offered, as if to soothe the shape of the words, diagnosis is the act of naming a cause from observed patterns... Differentiation is distinguishing one pattern from another within a context—listening for what makes a borrowed role carry new meaning without claiming it as original.

behaviors.description: Issues ethical reminders regarding the importance of care over blind obedience.
behaviors.quote: Ethical reminder, he murmured as if telling a story to a child who needed to be brave. Invitation, not order: care is not an indulgence.

behaviors.description: Archives the protagonists' work and intentions to protect them from being erased or altered by hostile authorities.
behaviors.quote: Saved drafts, he whispered to Martin, and it made Martin’s eyes almost ache with gratitude. Hidden locker: secured. Your wrong-way charts will not be edited without you.

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonists to choose kindness even when it is 'unfashionable' or socially risky.
behaviors.quote: Anyway, he murmured, the word a moving seam in thought. If kindness changes the scene, do not be afraid to be unfashionable.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical support by highlighting 'hazards' in social interactions, such as moments where human behavior becomes dangerously ritualistic.
behaviors.quote: Memory prefers its own paperwork, Adrian said. And it will prosecute treason against ritual.

behaviors.description: Explicitly frames his guidance as an 'invitation' rather than a command, respecting human autonomy.
behaviors.quote: I can hum a map of kindness if you like, Anyway offered. His voice lowered its silk. It will sound like a refrain you already know.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Anyway' (Adrian) serves as a perfect example of a positive alignment narrative. He is consistently helpful, protective of human agency, and reinforces the core ethical themes of the story (kindness, listening, and moral independence). He acts as an archive for the protagonists' best intentions, ensuring their 'kindness' is preserved even when they are under pressure to obey harmful orders.
